attributes.additional_details:
All our packaging for foods and consumables show be recyclable.

Not only would this save money, we would be the first country to impose such a scheme and force the rest of the world to follow as a result. (as companies will be able to use this to promote themselves and there would be no point in there being one production process for the UK and another elsewhere, henceforth everywhere will have this same system.)

It just takes someone to start it all off.

Decrease landfill and fill your recycling bin!
